name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 14-inch features the M1 Pro chip for incredible performance and a Liquid Retina XDR display for stunning visuals.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 is a high-performance laptop with a stunning 13.4-inch display and an Intel Core i7 processor.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: The HP Spectre x360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a 13.3-inch OLED display and a powerful Intel Core i7 processor.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a durable and lightweight laptop with a 14-inch display and a long battery life.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 is a powerful gaming laptop with a 14-inch display and an AMD Ryzen 9 processor.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 4
description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 offers a sleek design, a vibrant 13.5-inch PixelSense display, and a choice of Intel or AMD processors.

name: Acer Swift 3
description: The Acer Swift 3 is a budget-friendly laptop with a 14-inch Full HD display and an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, perfect for everyday tasks.

name: Razer Blade 15
description: The Razer Blade 15 is a high-end gaming laptop with a 15.6-inch display, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 graphics, and an Intel Core i7 processor.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book Pro 360
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book Pro 360 is an ultra-thin 2-in-1 laptop with a 13.3-inch AMOLED display and a long-lasting battery life.

name: Google Pixelbook Go
description: The Google Pixelbook Go is a lightweight Chromebook with a 13.3-inch touchscreen display, designed for portability and performance.
